        function e() {
            var bg = $('<div class="modal-bg">')
            var panel = $('<div class="modal-panel">')
            panel.html('<div class="modal-panel-body">' +
                '<div class="modal-info"></div>' +
                '<div class="modal-title">' + o.title[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-subtitle">' + o.listaA[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-text">»&nbsp;&nbsp;' + o.listaA1[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-text">»&nbsp;&nbsp;' + o.listaA2[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-text">»&nbsp;&nbsp;' + o.listaA3[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-subtitle">' + o.listaB[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-text">»&nbsp;&nbsp;' + o.listaB1[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-text">»&nbsp;&nbsp;' + o.listaB2[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-text">»&nbsp;&nbsp;' + o.listaB3[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-text">»&nbsp;&nbsp;' + o.listaB4[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-text">»&nbsp;&nbsp;' + o.listaB5[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-text">»&nbsp;&nbsp;' + o.listaB6[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-text">»&nbsp;&nbsp;' + o.listaB7[lang] + '</div>' +
                /*
                (Eliminar el requisito de PCR hacia San Andrés)
                '<div class="modal-text m-t-20px">' + o.resolution[lang] + '</div>' +
                */
                '<button class="btn primary pull-btn" type="submit" title="' + o.button[lang] + '" onclick="$(\'.modal-bg,.modal-panel\').remove();$(\'body\').removeClass(\'modal-open\')">' + o.button[lang] + '</button>' +
                '</div>')
            $('body').append(bg).append(panel)
        }

        $('#checkin,#checkin_mobile').not('.ready').click(function () {
            $('body').addClass('modal-open')
            e();
        }).addClass('ready')
    })();

        function e() {
            var bg = $('<div class="modal-bg">')
            var panel = $('<div class="modal-panel">')
            panel.html('<div class="modal-panel-body">' +
                '<div class="modal-info"></div>' +
                '<div class="modal-title">' + o.title[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-subtitle">' + o.listaA[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-text">»&nbsp;&nbsp;' + o.listaA1[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-text">»&nbsp;&nbsp;' + o.listaA2[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-text">»&nbsp;&nbsp;' + o.listaA3[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-subtitle">' + o.listaB[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-text">»&nbsp;&nbsp;' + o.listaB1[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-text">»&nbsp;&nbsp;' + o.listaB2[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-text">»&nbsp;&nbsp;' + o.listaB3[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-text">»&nbsp;&nbsp;' + o.listaB4[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-text">»&nbsp;&nbsp;' + o.listaB5[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-text">»&nbsp;&nbsp;' + o.listaB6[lang] + '</div>' +
                '<div class="modal-text">»&nbsp;&nbsp;' + o.listaB7[lang] + '</div>' +
                /*
                (Eliminar el requisito de PCR hacia San Andrés)
                '<div class="modal-text m-t-20px">' + o.resolution[lang] + '</div>' +
                */
                '<button class="btn primary pull-btn" type="submit" title="' + o.button[lang] + '" onclick="$(\'.modal-bg,.modal-panel\').remove();$(\'body\').removeClass(\'modal-open\')">' + o.button[lang] + '</button>' +
                '</div>')
            $('body').append(bg).append(panel)
        }

        $('#checkin,#checkin_mobile').not('.ready').click(function () {
            $('body').addClass('modal-open')
            e();
        }).addClass('ready')
    })();

      <script>
  // Validacion de internet explorer y carga de polyfills para uso de fetch y promises.
  var isIE11 = false;
  if (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('MSIE') !== -1
    || navigator.appVersion.indexOf('Trident/') > -1) {
    isIE11 = true;
    $.getScript('https://polyfill.io/v3/polyfill.min.js?flags=gated&features=default%2Cfetch%2CNumber.parseInt', function (data, textStatus, jqxhr) {
      if (jqxhr.status == 200) {
        console.log('Loading polyfill to IE11... Status:: ' + jqxhr.status);
      }
      else {
        console.log('Error cargando polyfills de IE11 .. status ::' + jqxhr.status);
      }
    });
  }
</script>

OS"],[n,/_/g,"."]],[/((?:open)?solaris)[\/\s-]?([\w\.]*)/i,/(aix)\s((\d)(?=\.|\)|\s)[\w\.])*/i,/(plan\s9|minix|beos|os\/2|amigaos|morphos|risc\sos|openvms|fuchsia)/i,/(unix)\s?([\w\.]*)/i],[e,n]]},x=function(i,s){if("object"==typeof   /*
 * Avianca's dataLayer.js
 * Version: 1.3.3
 * Date: 2017-10-04

 * Author: Diego Riccio (Accenture Interactive)

dataLayerObjName = 'gtmDt';
gtmId = 'GTM-MN8ZW48';
domain = 'avianca.com';
domainRegExp = new RegExp(/((avianca|e\-travel|amadeus)\.com)|amadeus\.net$/gi);
function getFullMonth(month){
	switch(month.toString()) {
		case '01':
		case '1':
			var ptMonth = 'January';
			break;
		case '02':
		case '2':
			var ptMonth = 'February';
			break;
		case '03':
		case '3':
			var ptMonth = 'March';
			break;
		case '04':
		case '4':
			var ptMonth = 'April';
			break;
		case '05':
		case '5':
			var ptMonth = 'May';
			break;
		case '06':
		case '6':
			var ptMonth = 'June';
			break;
		case '07':
		case '7':
			var ptMonth = 'July';
			break;
		case '08':
		case '8':
			var ptMonth = 'August';
			break;
		case '09':
		case '9':
			var ptMonth = 'September';
			break;
		case '10':
			var ptMonth = 'October';
			break;
		case '11':
			var ptMonth = 'November';
			break;
		case '12':
			var ptMonth = 'December';
			break;
		default:
			return month;
	}

	return ptMonth;
}
function getWeekDay(weekday){
	switch(weekday.toString()) {
		case '0':
			var ptMonth = 'Sunday';
			break;
		case '1':
			var ptMonth = 'Monday';
			break;
		case '2':
			var ptMonth = 'Tuesday';
			break;
		case '3':
			var ptMonth = 'Wednesday';
			break;
		case '4':
			var ptMonth = 'Thursday';
			break;
		case '5':
			var ptMonth = 'Friday';
			break;
		case '6':
			var ptMonth = 'Saturday';
			break;
		case '7':
			var ptMonth = 'Sunday';
			break;
		default:
			return weekday;
	}

	return ptMonth;
}
function getCookie(check_name){
	//first we'll split this cookie up into name/value pairs
	//note: document.cookie only returns name=value, not the other components
	var a_all_cookies = document.cookie.split(';');
	var a_temp_cookie = '';
	var cookie_name = '';
	var cookie_value = '';
	var b_cookie_found = false; // set boolean t/f default f

	for (i = 0; i < a_all_cookies.length; i++) {
		// now we'll split apart each name=value pair
		a_temp_cookie = a_all_cookies[i].split('=');
		// and trim left/right whitespace while we're at it
		cookie_name = a_temp_cookie[0].replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g, '');
		// if the extracted name matches passed check_name
		if (cookie_name == check_name) {
			b_cookie_found = true;
			// we need to handle case where cookie has no value but exists (no = sign, that is):
			if (a_temp_cookie.length > 1) {
				cookie_value = unescape(a_temp_cookie[1].replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g, ''));
			}
			// note that in cases where cookie is initialized but no value, null is returned
			return cookie_value;
			break;
		}
		a_temp_cookie = null;
		cookie_name = '';
	}
	if (!b_cookie_found) {
		return null;
	}
}
function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
	var expires = "";
	if (exdays != null) {
	    var d = new Date();
	    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
	    expires = ";expires="+ d.toUTCString();
	}
    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + expires + ";domain=."+domain+";path=/";
}
window[dataLayerObjName] = window[dataLayerObjName] || [];
window[dataLayerObjName].push({
	pageTitle: 'ES', // Page Title (String)
    pageURL: 'http://localhost:4502/co/es.html', // Page URL (String)
    pageType: 'Root', // Home, Deals and Offers, Electronics Services... (String)
    pageName: 'es', // Page Name to be sent in the place of the Path
    navCountry: 'co', // Country (String)
    navLang: 'es', // Language (String)
    salesChannel: 'b2c', // Sales Channel (b2b, b2c, b2g) (String)
    pfqtv: false, // Frequent traveler-Lifemiles member (Boolean)
    user: (function(){
		var obj = {},
			today = new Date().getTime(), // Current Unix Time Stamp (String)
			lastVisit = getCookie('lastVisit'), // Last Visit Unix Time Stamp (String)
			lastSearch = (function(){ try{ var cookieValue = getCookie('lastSearch'); return JSON.parse(cookieValue);}catch(e){return null;}; })(), // Last Search JSON
			lastTransaction = (function(){ try{ var cookieValue = getCookie('lastTransaction'); return JSON.parse(cookieValue);}catch(e){return null;}; })(); // Last Transaction JSON String '{timestamp:(Unix Time Stamp),route:(String)}'
		obj.buyer = (lastTransaction != null); // User has made a purchase at some point (Boolean)
		obj.logged = (document.cookie.indexOf('AVSESSION_ID') > -1); // User is currently logged (Boolean)
		obj.cookieId = (function(){ // Google Analytics Cookie ID (String)
			var cookieId = getCookie('_ga'),
				gaId = null;
			if (cookieId != null) {
				gaId = cookieId.match(/(\d+\.\d+)$/g);
				if (gaId != null) return gaId[0] || cookieId;
				return cookieId;
			}
			return null;
		})();
		obj.recognized = (function(){ try{ var cookieValue = getCookie('recognized'); return (cookieValue != null);}catch(e){return false;}; })(); // If the user has ever logged to the website (Boolean)
		obj.lastVisitDays = (function(){ try{ return (lastVisit != null ? Math.floor((today-parseInt(lastVisit))/86400000) : null);}catch(e){return null;}; })(); // Days since last visit (Interger)
		obj.lastSearchDays = (function(){ try{ return (lastSearch != null ? Math.floor((today-parseInt(lastSearch.timestamp))/86400000) : null);}catch(e){return null;}; })(); // Days since last visit (Integer)
		obj.lastTransaction = (function(){ try{ return (lastTransaction != null ? Math.floor((today-parseInt(lastTransaction.timestamp))/86400000) : null);}catch(e){return null;}; })(); // Days since last transaction (Integer)
		obj.lastBoughtRoute = (function(){ try{ return (lastTransaction != null ? lastTransaction.Trayecto : null);}catch(e){return null;}; })(); // Last Purchased Route (String)
		obj.userInfo = (function(){ try{ if (document.cookie.indexOf('AVSESSION_ID') == -1) { setCookie('userInfo','',0); return null; }; var cookieValue = getCookie('userInfo'); return JSON.parse(cookieValue);}catch(e){return null;}; })(); // User Info JSON String '{name:(String),lastName:(String),lifeMiles:(String),sessionToken:(String),message:(String)}'
		return obj;
	})(),
	page: {
		owner: 'Avianca', // Fixed value (String)
		channel: 'web', // Platform Type (web, app...) Fixed value (String)
		segment: 'b2c', // Sales Channel (b2b, b2c, b2g) (String)
		platform: 'AEM', // AEM, IBE DX, IBE xHTML... (String)
		navCountry: 'co', // Country (String)
		navLang: 'es', // Language (String)
		title: 'ES', // Page Title (String)
		url: 'http://localhost:4502/co/es.html', // Page URL (String)
		section: 'ES', // First Breadcrumb (String)
		subsection1: 'ES', // Second Breadcrumb (String)
		subsection2: 'ES', // Third Breadcrumb (String)
		name: 'ES', // Last Breadcrumb (String)
		path: (function(currentPageName){ // Bahavior Path (Concatenated Page Name) **Cookie must be Session based** (String)
			try{
				var str = getCookie('navPath');
				if (str != null) {
					str = (str+':'+currentPageName);
					if (str.length > 150) { str = str.substr(-150).split(':'); str = str.length == 1 ? str[0] : str.slice(1).join(':'); }
				} else { str = currentPageName; }
				setCookie('navPath',str,1/48);
				return str;
			}catch(e){return "";}
		})('ES'), // This should contain the same value that is on the name variable (Last Breadcrumb)
		previous: (function(){ try{ return getCookie('previousPage') || ""}catch(e){return "";} })(), // Previous Page URL (String)
		referral: (function(){ try{ var cookieValue = getCookie('referral'); return cookieValue || "";}catch(e){return "";}; })() // Landing Page's referral **Session based cookie of the landing page referrer** (String)
	},
	technology: (function(){
		var obj = {
			userAgent: window.navigator.userAgent, // User Agent (String)
			cookiesEnabled: (function(){ try { return ("cookie" in document && (document.cookie.length > 0 || (document.cookie = "test").indexOf.call(document.cookie, "test") > -1)); }catch(e){return undefined;} })(), // Browser Cookie Enabled (Boolean)
			screenResolution: window.screen.width+'x'+window.screen.height, // Screen Resolution (String)
			serviceProvider: (function(){ try{ var cookieValue = getCookie('serviceProvider'); return JSON.parse(cookieValue) || {loaded:false};}catch(e){return {loaded:false};} })() // Internet Service Provider Name JSON '{loaded:true,name:(String)}'
		}
		try {
			var uaParsed = new UAParser().getResult();
			obj.browser = uaParsed.browser; // Browser Information JSON String '{major:(String),name:(String),version:(String)}'
			obj.operatingSystem = uaParsed.os; // Operational System JSON String '{name:(String),version:(String)}'
			obj.device = uaParsed.device; // Device Information JSON String '{model:(String),type:(String),vendor:(String)}'
		}catch(e){
			obj.browser = {major:undefined,name:undefined,version:undefined};
			obj.operatingSystem = {name:undefined,version:undefined};
			obj.device = {model:undefined,type:undefined,vendor:undefined};
		}
		return obj;
	})(),
	visit: (function(){
		var obj = {},
			today = new Date();
		obj.holiday = (function(){ try{ var cookieValue = getCookie('holiday'); return JSON.parse(cookieValue) || {loaded:false};}catch(e){return {loaded:false};}; })(); // JSON String containing holiday information '{loaded:(Boolean),publicHoliday:(Boolean),holidayType:(String),holidayRegion:(String)}' **The cookie should be session based**
		obj.location = (function(){ try{ var cookieValue = getCookie('location'); return JSON.parse(cookieValue) || {loaded:false};}catch(e){return {loaded:false};}; })(); // JSON String containing location '{loaded:(Boolean),region:(String),city:(String),zip:(String)}' **The cookie should be session based**
		obj.weather = (function(){ try{ var cookieValue = getCookie('weather'); return JSON.parse(cookieValue) || {loaded:false};}catch(e){return {loaded:false};}; })(); // JSON String containing weather '{loaded:(Boolean),temp:(Integer),weather:(String)}' **The cookie should be session based**
		try {
			obj.day = today.getDate(); // Current User Local Day (Integer)
			obj.day = obj.day < 10 ? '0'+obj.day : obj.day; // Current User Local Day (String)
			obj.month = today.getMonth()+1; // Current User Local Month (Integer)
			obj.month = obj.month < 10 ? '0'+obj.month : obj.month; // Current User Local Month (String)
			obj.monthName = getFullMonth(obj.month); // Current User Local Month Name (String)
			obj.year = today.getFullYear().toString(); // Current User Local Full Year (String)
			obj.date = obj.day+'/'+obj.month+'/'+obj.year; // Current User Local Formatted Date dd/mm/yyyy (String)
			obj.timezone = parseInt(today.getTimezoneOffset()/60*-1); // Current User UTC Time Zone (Integer)
			obj.timezone = (obj.timezone > 0 ? '+' : '')+obj.timezone; // Current User UTC Time Zone (String)
			obj.hour = today.getHours(); // Current User Local Hour Formatted 'hh' 24h (String)
			obj.hour = obj.hour < 10 ? '0'+obj.hour : obj.hour.toString();
			obj.minutes = today.getMinutes();
			obj.minutes = obj.minutes < 10 ? '0'+obj.minutes : obj.minutes.toString();
			obj.time = obj.hour+':'+obj.minutes; // Current User Local Time Formatted 'hh:mm' 24h (String)
			obj.secs = today.getSeconds();
			obj.secs = obj.secs < 10 ? '0'+obj.secs : obj.secs.toString();
			obj.timeExact = obj.time+':'+obj.secs; // Current User Local Exact Time Formatted 'hh:mm:ss' 24h (String)
			obj.weekday = getWeekDay(today.getDay()); // Name of the day of the Week (String)
			obj.weekdayWeekend = (obj.weekday == 'Sunday' || obj.weekday == 'Saturday') ? 'weekend' : 'weekday'; // Type of the day of the week (weekday, weekend) (String)
		} catch(e){}
		return obj;
	})(),
	lastBanner: (function(){ try{ var cookieValue = getCookie('lastBanner'); return JSON.parse(cookieValue) || null;}catch(e){return null;}; })(), // JSON String containing last banner interatction '{name:(String),position:(String),pageUrl:(String),targetUrl:(String)}' **The cookie should be session based**
	lastSearch: (function(){ try{ var cookieValue = getCookie('lastSearch'); return JSON.parse(cookieValue) || null;}catch(e){return null;}; })(), // JSON String containing last flight search '{timestamp:(String),searchType:(String),flightType:(String),flightRoutes:(Array),flightDates:(Array),flightClass:(String),flexibleDates:(Boolean),promoCode:(String),adultsAmount:(Integer),childenAmount:(Integer),infantsAmount:(Integer)}' **The cookie should be persistent**
	campaign: (function(){
		var campaign = (function(){ try{ var cookieValue = getCookie('campaignData'); return JSON.parse(cookieValue) || {};}catch(e){return {};}; })(),
			obj = {
				campaignNameInternal: campaign.campaignNameInternal,
				campaignNameExternal: campaign.campaignNameExternal || '(not set)',
				campaignSource: campaign.campaignSource || '(direct)',
				campaignMedium: campaign.campaignMedium || '(none)',
				campaignTerm: campaign.campaignTerm || '(none)',
				campaignContent: campaign.campaignContent || '(none)'
			}, utms = document.location.search.match(/utm_(source|medium|term|content|campaign)\=[^=&]+/gi);
		try {
			if (utms != null) {
				utms = (function(arr){var utms={};arr.map(function(x){var z= x.split('=');utms[z[0]] = z[1];});return utms;})(utms);
				obj = {
					campaignNameInternal: campaign.campaignNameInternal,
					campaignNameExternal: utms.utm_campaign || '(not set)',
					campaignSource: utms.utm_source || '(direct)',
					campaignMedium: utms.utm_medium || '(none)',
					campaignTerm: utms.utm_term  || '(none)',
					campaignContent: utms.utm_content || '(none)'
				};
			} else if (document.location.href.indexOf('gclid') != -1) {
				obj = {
					campaignNameInternal: campaign.campaignNameInternal,
					campaignNameExternal: utms.utm_campaign || '(not set)',
					campaignSource: utms.utm_source || 'google',
					campaignMedium: utms.utm_medium || 'cpc',
					campaignTerm: '(none)',
					campaignContent: '(none)'
				};
			} else if (document.location.href.indexOf('dclid') != -1) {
				obj = {
					campaignNameInternal: campaign.campaignNameInternal,
					campaignNameExternal: utms.utm_campaign || '(not set)',
					campaignSource: utms.utm_source || 'google',
					campaignMedium: utms.utm_medium || 'ads',
					campaignTerm: '(none)',
					campaignContent: '(none)'
				};
			} else if (document.referrer != "") {
				var source = document.referrer.match(/((\w+)?\.?bing\.com(\.\w+)?)|((\w+)?\.?search\.yahoo\.com(\.\w+)?)|((\w+)?\.?google\.com(\.\w+)?)/gi);
				if (source != null) {
					source = source[0].match(/\w+\.com/gi)[0].split('.')[0];
					var medium = 'organic';
				}
				else {
					source = document.referrer.match(/\:\/\/(\w+\.?)+[^=\/]/gi)[0].substr(3);
					var medium = 'referrer';
				}
				if (source.match(domainRegExp) == null) {
					obj = {
						campaignNameInternal: campaign.campaignNameInternal,
						campaignNameExternal: '(not set)',
						campaignSource: source,
						campaignMedium: medium,
						campaignTerm: '(none)',
						campaignContent: '(none)'
					};
				}
			}
		} catch(e) { console.error('Data Model - campaignData', e); }
		try {
			setCookie('campaignData',JSON.stringify(obj),1/48);
		} catch(e) { console.error('Data Model - setCookie campaignData', e); }
		return obj;
	})(),
	social: (function(){ try{ var cookieValue = getCookie('socialInteractions'); return JSON.parse(cookieValue) || undefined;}catch(e){return undefined;}; })(), // JSON String containing last social interatction '{network:(String),action:(String),pageUrl:(String),targetUrl:(String)}' **The cookie should be session based**
	transaction: (function(){ try{ var cookieValue = getCookie('lastTransaction'); return JSON.parse(cookieValue) || undefined;}catch(e){return undefined;}; })() // JSON String containing all the Transaction Information **The cookie should live as long as it can** ### This funciton should run all page exept the Transaction Page

});

    <div class="cortinilla_accesibilidad modal login-alert fade modal-salida-avianca no-padding" id="salidaExterna" role="dialog" aria-labelledby="modal_acc_title" aria-describedby="modal_acc_desc" aria-modal="true" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="false">
    <div class="modal-dialog row" role="document">
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">

                                                <div class="modal-promocod visually-hidden" id="addPromocodModal-694770031" role="dialog" aria-modal="true" aria-hidden="false">

    <section class="c-webcheckin" data-widget="innertabs-general-pestana">
        
            <div class="webcheckin-container white">
                <div class="i18nCalendario17a" data-descuento="De descuento" data-equipajemanocontent="1 x 10 Kg / 22 Lbs + 1 artículo personal" data-directo="Directo" data-pocossegundos="Pocos                 <h2 class="text-center title">Todo lo que necesitas saber sobre el COVID-19</h2>
                <p class="subtitle text-center">Revisa todos los requisitos exigidos para tu viaje, sigue las recomendaciones y conoce nuestras políticas de flexibilidad.</p>

<script type="text/javascript">
    (function () {
        window.__gigyaConf = JSON.parse('{"enabledProviders":"facebook, twitter","sessionExpiration":43200,"shortURLs":"whenRequired"}');
        var gig = document.createElement('script');
        gig.type = 'text/javascript';
        gig.async = true;
        gig.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://cdns' : 'http://cdn') + '.gigya.com/js/gigya.js?apiKey=3_hzLIKhRwAX20Ih8ghBS7rkNN8HLuLNvfrGxAsSPGLfJ3sPJOkwTk-7o9aMUzDFd1&lang=es';
        document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(gig);
        window.__gigyaApiKey = '3_hzLIKhRwAX20Ih8ghBS7rkNN8HLuLNvfrGxAsSPGLfJ3sPJOkwTk-7o9aMUzDFd1';
        window.__gigyaConfName = 'config-gigya-prod';

    })();
    function gigyaChecklogout() {
		var createCookie = function(name, value, days) {
            if (days) {
                var date = new Date();
                date.setTime(date.getTime() + (days * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
                var expires = "; expires=" + date.toGMTString();
            }
            else var expires = "";               

            document.cookie = name + "=" + value + expires + "; path=/";
        };
        var readCookie = function(name) {
            var nameEQ = name + "=";
            var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
            for (var i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
                var c = ca[i];
                while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') c = c.substring(1, c.length);
                if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length, c.length);
            }
            return null;
        };
        var eraseCookie = function(name) {
            createCookie(name, "", -1);
        }
		if (readCookie("gigyaLogout") === "true") {
            gigya.accounts.logout();
			eraseCookie("gigyaLogout");
        }
    }
    function onGigyaServiceReady(serviceName) {
        gigyaChecklogout();
        if (window.gigyaInit) {
            var length = window.gigyaInit.length,
                    element = null;
            if (length > 0) {
                for (var i = 0; i < length; i++) {
                    element = window.gigyaInit[i];
                    func = element.function;
                    var parts = func.split("\.");
                    var f = gigya[parts[0]][parts[1]];
                    if (typeof f === "function") {
                        f(element.parameters);
                    }
                }
            }
            if (window.gigyaAem.functions.raasOnLoginCallback) {
                gigya.accounts.addEventHandlers(
                        {
                            onLogin: window.gigyaAem.functions.raasOnLoginCallback
                        }
                )
            }
        }
    }

</script>


</div>
